content:
RemoteArgumentKind Enum

Definition

Specifies the kind of argument that a RemoteArgument represents.

In this Article

public enum RemoteArgumentKind
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
RemoteArgumentKind

Remarks

The RemoteArgumentKind enumeration is used by the RemoteArgumentKind property.

An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the IsPrimitive property of the type is true) or a String, Decimal, DateTime, or DBNull.

Fields

Contract

The RemoteArgument represents an IContract.
Intrinsic

The RemoteArgument represents an intrinsic data type.
IntrinsicArray

The RemoteArgument represents an Array that contains elements of an intrinsic data type.
Missing

The RemoteArgument represents the Missing value. This is the default value for the stem.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind* property.
